entrance.title: Welcome to the Manual
entrance.description:
The FlashBoss manual is built to mirror the game itself, with information pertaining to playing the game, and also with a link for more information. This page doesn't need such a link, as there isn't a lot to tell.

Click the blue parent buttons to go back, or choose a magenta option to go forward. Every screen in the game has a page here. Explore at your own pace.

profile-select.title: Profile Selection
profile-select.description:
FlashBoss supports up to 5 user profiles. Each slot shows the user's avatar, name, and chosen master.

Empty slots display "Create New Hero" - selecting one begins character creation. Selecting an existing profile enters the Gates.

gates.title: The Gates
gates.description:
Each day you enter the academy, your master meets you at the gates. What are you here for today?

Have you come to study your flashcards, or are you looking to go to another class? If you would like to take a level placement test, you can prove your knowledge and skip tiers with the Tier Skip Challenge, Option 8.

create-username.title: Create Username
create-username.description:
Enter a username for your new hero. This name will appear on your profile and leaderboards.

Type your desired name and press Enter to confirm. Press 9 then Enter to cancel.

create-avatar.title: Create Avatar
create-avatar.description:
Choose an avatar to represent your hero. Pick from a variety of pixel art characters.

Use number keys to select your avatar.

create-master.title: Choose Master
create-master.description:
Select your guide: Luna, Claude, Odiin, Shen, Kitsune, or Aquila. Each master has their own personality and teaching style.

Your master provides encouragement and guidance throughout your journey.

master-luna.title: Luna
master-luna.description:
Luna is your guide. Her personality and teaching style will accompany you throughout your journey.

Press 5 to confirm your choice and continue to language pack selection.

master-claude.title: Claude
master-claude.description:
Claude is your guide. His personality and teaching style will accompany you throughout your journey.

Press 5 to confirm your choice and continue to language pack selection.

master-odiin.title: Odiin
master-odiin.description:
Odiin is your guide. His personality and teaching style will accompany you throughout your journey.

Press 5 to confirm your choice and continue to language pack selection.

master-shen.title: Shen
master-shen.description:
Shen is your guide. His personality and teaching style will accompany you throughout your journey.

Press 5 to confirm your choice and continue to language pack selection.

master-kitsune.title: Kitsune
master-kitsune.description:
Kitsune is your guide. Her personality and teaching style will accompany you throughout your journey.

Press 5 to confirm your choice and continue to language pack selection.

master-aquila.title: Aquila
master-aquila.description:
Aquila is your guide. Her personality and teaching style will accompany you throughout your journey.

Press 5 to confirm your choice and continue to language pack selection.

create-pack.title: Choose Language Pack
create-pack.subheader: Click on a Thumbnail for a Tour
create-pack.description:
Select your language pack. German Core and Esperanto are included. More packs available as DLC.

Each pack contains vocabulary organized into tiers and clusters.

Watch a full walkthrough of either path below.

profile-data.title: Profile Data
profile-data.description:
View your hero's stats: language pack, tier progress, streak, velocity, and trajectory.

Option 7 toggles between active and frozen states. When active: 5 = Tier Skip, 8 = Meet Masters. When frozen: 5 = Delete, 8 = disabled.

Press 9 to return (destination depends on where you came from).

sanctum.title: The Sanctum
sanctum.descriptionHTML: The Sanctum is your desk in your master's chambers. This is where you conduct your daily studies. Know Your Enemy allows you to see your word lists, and challenge bosses. Review Cards begins your studies, and Your Records lets you keep track of your progress.

know-your-enemy.title: Know Your Enemy
know-your-enemy.description:
Study vocabulary before battle. Browse words by cluster and tier to prepare for the BossRun challenge.

Press 1-8 to select a cluster, 6 (→) for next page, or 9 to return to the Sanctum.

kye-page2.title: Know Your Enemy
kye-page2.description:
More clusters available on this page.

Press 4 (←) for previous page, 1 to view the Food & Drink cluster, or 9 to return.

kye-list.title: Food & Drink
kye-list.description:
Word list for Cluster 9: Food & Drink in Esperanto.

Press 6 for next page, 8 to toggle English view, or 9 to return.

kye-list2.title: Food & Drink
kye-list2.description:
Word list page 2 for Cluster 9: Food & Drink in Esperanto.

Press 4 for previous page, 8 to toggle English view, or 9 to return.

kye-listeng.title: Food & Drink
kye-listeng.description:
Word list for Cluster 9: Food & Drink with English translations.

Press 6 for next page, 8 to toggle Esperanto view, or 9 to return.

kye-list2eng.title: Food & Drink
kye-list2eng.description:
Word list page 2 for Cluster 9: Food & Drink with English translations.

Press 4 for previous page, 8 to toggle Esperanto view, or 9 to return.

spaced-repetition.title: Continue Your Studies
spaced-repetition.description:
Your daily flashcard practice. Rate each card 0-5 based on how well you remember it.

Press * to advance. Enter repeats the word, 6 repeats the sentence.

grimoire.title: The Grimoire
grimoire.description:
The Grimoire allows extra practice after completing your daily cards. Each Grimoire session earns you Drive - saved-up days off that protect your streak.

Press 5 to open the Grimoire, 8 for rules, or 9 to return.

grimoire-rules.title: Grimoire Rules
grimoire-rules.description:
Drive is the mismatch between sanctum time and reality. When you complete a Grimoire session, you pull time forward by a day.

Your Drive equals saved-up days off. If you miss a day, Drive is consumed instead of breaking your streak.

Press 9 to return to the Grimoire.

tier-skip.title: Tier Skip Challenge
tier-skip.description:
Not everybody comes to FlashBoss at ground level. Try your hand at the tier skip challenge.

If you already have the knowledge you can skip ahead. But it never hurts to cover what you know. That's what the hard masters are for.

bossrun-challenge.title: BossRun Challenge
bossrun-challenge.description:
You are about to face the BossRun challenge. Answer correctly to survive and prove your vocabulary knowledge.

Press 5 to begin. Press 9 to return to Tier Skip.

bossfight.title: BossRun
bossfight.description:
Face the BossRun challenge! Answer correctly to survive and prove your vocabulary knowledge.

Click the image or press * to advance through the battle. Press 9 to skip to the Sanctum.

achievements.title: Achievements: Journey
achievements.description:
Journey achievements track your overall progress through FlashBoss.

Press 6 for next category. Press 9 to return to Profile Data.

achievements-2.title: Achievements: Mastery
achievements-2.description:
Mastery achievements track vocabulary completion and retention.

Press 4 for previous, 6 for next. Press 9 to return to Profile Data.

achievements-3.title: Achievements: Streaks
achievements-3.description:
Streak achievements reward consistent daily practice.

Press 4 for previous, 6 for next. Press 9 to return to Profile Data.

achievements-4.title: Achievements: Combat
achievements-4.description:
Combat achievements track BossRun victories and battles.

Press 4 for previous, 6 for next. Press 9 to return to Profile Data.

achievements-5.title: Achievements: Global
achievements-5.description:
Global achievements are special milestones shared across all profiles.

Press 4 for previous. Press 9 to return to Profile Data.

export-progress.title: Export Progress
export-progress.description: Save your profile to the Backup Vault. Creates a backup that can be restored later.

meet-masters.title: Meet the Masters
meet-masters.description:
You found it! This is the place to earn a beta key - the full game, free for life.

Selecting a master takes you back to the Profile Data screen. In the game, you will now have your chosen master. Which master did you choose?

mm-luna.title: Luna
mm-luna.description:
You found it! This is the place to earn a beta key - the full game, free for life.

Selecting a master takes you back to the Profile Data screen. In the game, you will now have your chosen master. Which master did you choose?

mm-claude.title: Claude
mm-claude.description:
You found it! This is the place to earn a beta key - the full game, free for life.

Selecting a master takes you back to the Profile Data screen. In the game, you will now have your chosen master. Which master did you choose?

mm-odiin.title: Odiin
mm-odiin.description:
You found it! This is the place to earn a beta key - the full game, free for life.

Selecting a master takes you back to the Profile Data screen. In the game, you will now have your chosen master. Which master did you choose?

mm-shen.title: Shen
mm-shen.description:
You found it! This is the place to earn a beta key - the full game, free for life.

Selecting a master takes you back to the Profile Data screen. In the game, you will now have your chosen master. Which master did you choose?

mm-kitsune.title: Kitsune
mm-kitsune.description:
You found it! This is the place to earn a beta key - the full game, free for life.

Selecting a master takes you back to the Profile Data screen. In the game, you will now have your chosen master. Which master did you choose?

mm-aquila.title: Aquila
mm-aquila.description:
You found it! This is the place to earn a beta key - the full game, free for life.

Selecting a master takes you back to the Profile Data screen. In the game, you will now have your chosen master. Which master did you choose?

vault.title: Backup Vault
vault.description:
The vault stores backed-up profiles for later restoration.

Press 1 to view a preserved hero's frozen data. The thumbnails show screens that only appear when the database is empty.

Press 9 to return to Profile Selection.

profile-data-vault.title: Profile Data (Vault)
profile-data-vault.description:
The screen appears frozen and grey to indicate the profile is inactive.

Options: Delete Permanently (5), Achievements (6), Restore/Toggle (7), Meet the Masters (8 - disabled while frozen).

Press 7 to toggle revival - the hero comes back to colour. Press 9 to return (destination depends on where you came from).

delete-profile.title: Delete Profile
delete-profile.description:
Confirm permanent deletion of this profile. This action cannot be undone.

Press Enter to confirm deletion. Press 9 then Enter to cancel and return.

profile-deleted.title: Profile Deleted
profile-deleted.description:
The profile has been permanently deleted.

Press any key to return to Profile Selection.

about-1.title: About FlashBoss
about-1.description:
FlashBoss is collaborative language learning software built through conversation between a teacher who can't code and an AI who can.

Core Principles: Fibonacci-based spaced repetition, engagement through gamification, graded language progression, complex mechanics → simple interface.

about-2.title: Coming Soon
about-2.description:
Language packs in development: French Core, French Pareto 1 & 2, Italian Core, Spanish Core.

English Expansion: Vocabulary Builder, German Roots, Latin Roots, Medical Terminology, Legal Terminology.

about-3.title: Links & Contact
about-3.description:
Steam App ID: 4134440
Community Hub: steamcommunity.com/app/4134440

Contact: flashbosscontact@gmail.com
Website: odiin2024.github.io/flashboss-site

about-4.title: Third-Party Software
about-4.description:
Text-to-Speech powered by Piper TTS (MIT License) and eSpeak-ng (GPL v3).

Voice Models: German (Thorsten Mueller, CC0), Polish (Darkman, CC0).

hints-tips.title: Hints & Tips
hints-tips.description:
FlashBoss is built around a simple principal: 5 leads you forward, and 9 takes you back.

Focus on streak completion. Grimoire completion earns you a 1 day streak buffer.

Useful shortcuts: 555 (Review Cards), 568 (Change Master), 54 (Boss Fights), 5661 (Achievements), 567 (Backup Profile).

lesson-pack-select.title: Select Lesson Pack
lesson-pack-select.description:
Access all lessons for any installed language pack.

1. Esperanto - 69 Lessons, 3 sets, 15 tiers
2. German - 67 Lessons, 3 sets, 15 tiers

german-lessons.title: German Core Lessons
german-lessons.description:
Browse all German Core lessons organized by tier.

Tier 1: pronunciation, modal verbs, question words, gender & articles, numbers, present tense, negation.

Press 1-8 to view a lesson, arrow keys to navigate pages.

lesson-content.title: Lesson Content
lesson-content.description:
Example: Lesson 2 - Modal Verbs.

Modal verbs express ability, permission, obligation, or desire: können (can), dürfen (may), sollen (should), müssen (must), wollen (want to), möchten (would like).

Structure: Modal + infinitive at the END.

terminal.title: Terminal
terminal.description: Press 9 to exit and you'll land here - your terminal, in the FlashBoss directory. This is where the CLI commands live.
terminal.windowsNote: Windows commands: FlashBoss.exe, FlashBoss.exe audio, FlashBoss.exe workshop

terminal-audio.title: Audio Configuration
terminal-audio.description:
TTS engine settings and cache management. Run ./FlashBoss audio to access.

Commands: piper, espeak, reset, cache, cache -de, cache-delete, cache-delete -de, cache-delete --de

Windows: Use backslash (\) for paths. Commands take the form FlashBoss.exe audio.

terminal-workshop.title: Workshop
terminal-workshop.description:
Standalone tools for language learning. Run independently of the main program.

Tools: pronounce (Piper TTS Studio), cards (Card Viewer). More coming soon...

Windows: Use backslash (\) for paths. Commands take the form FlashBoss.exe workshop.

terminal-flashboss.title: ./FlashBoss
terminal-flashboss.description:
Return to FlashBoss. Type ./FlashBoss (or FlashBoss.exe on Windows) to launch the game.

Windows: Use backslash (\) for paths. Executables don't need ./ prefix - just run FlashBoss.exe directly.
